lines.text: I'm with the Trotter Poll. We're like the Gallop Poll but not as fast.
On horse flies is / In comb bees is / On chest knob is / In knob keys is
[singsong child's chant that solves the mystery]
It's like looking for a needle in a... a slaughter house.

[after Pete has blown out the candle, and he and the Fleagles see that her skin glows in the dark]
I glow, don't I?
I knowed it! I'm p'isoned, and
they're the ones that done it to me!
What to you want to do, live forever?
They'd sooner cut your throat as peel an apple.

[to Grandma]
Whatta wanna do... live forever?

[to Pete]
What yuh think we are - hicks?
There's some kind of fiddle-faddle goin' around here!
